import "../../style/components/header.css" import logo from "../../assets/img/argentBankLogo.png" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import { useStore } from "react-redux" function Header () { const store = useStore() const logged = store.getState().logged console.log(logged) const logOff = () => { localStorage.clear() sessionStorage.clear() store.dispatch({type:"setFirstname",payload:""}) store.dispatch({type:"setLastname",payload:""}) store.dispatch({type:"loggedOff"}) } if (logged === true) { console.log("On est LOGGED !") return (

Argent Bank
Tony Sign Out
) } else { return (

Argent Bank

Sign In
) } } export default Header
